channel.title: Computer sounds not workin...[FIXED THANKS TO COONHUNTER]
channel.description:
Hey everybody. Well today I started workin on my Zombie Arcadium game and I tried adding sounds so I ran the game and no sound came out. I checked all my volume controls and updated the drivers still nothing. Finally i took the computer apart to check to make sure a cable didnt get loose with the connectors but everything is fine. Any ideas? This is the error I get:
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/error.jpg[/img]
EDIT** And yes the speakers work on my other computer so I know its not the speakers

item.title: Computer sounds not workin...[FIXED THANKS TO COONHUNTER]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The hotkeys on my laptop stopped working, including keyboard backlights. Thats what fixed it for me. Figured id pop that suggestion and see lol. Glad it worked, no sound makes messing around on the computer very boring.

Read full topic
item.source: Computer sounds not workin...[FIXED THANKS TO COONHUNTER]

item.title: Computer sounds not workin...[FIXED THANKS TO COONHUNTER]
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

CoonHunter:

Could be a bad sound card. I would, first, go into the device manager. Completely uninstall,your sound drivers. Grom tjere, reboot. If you have vista or 7, let it install. If you have xp, install it manually. If that doesnt work, you might need a new sound card.

Thanks man never thought of that worked like a charm. Would rep++ if I could

Read full topic
item.source: Computer sounds not workin...[FIXED THANKS TO COONHUNTER]

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Could be a bad sound card. I would, first, go into the device manager. Completely uninstall,your sound drivers. Grom tjere, reboot. If you have vista or 7, let it install. If you have xp, install it manually. If that doesnt work, you might need a new sound card.
